summary: Trapped in a cave, five men cut the arm off of another companion in order to ward off starvation. After they are saved, their victim seeks revenge on them one by one.
cast: Deborah Walley|Paul Carr|David G. Cannon|Marvin Kaplan|John Crawford|Vince Martorano|Ray Dannis|Bob Guthrie|Cynthia Gabrielle|George Dunn|Alan DeWitt|R. Lance Thomas|Gwen Cannon|Marcellous Smith|Wally K. Berns|Kay Elliot|Treva Frazee|Virginia Alfonte|Sebastian Korman
keywords: bare chested male|wrapped in a towel|man wrapped in a towel|male objectification|cult
director: Director: Tom Alderman (as Thomas S. Alderman)
title: Brazo asesino
